verses.text_plain: Unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
verses.verse_html: 1Unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

verses.text_plain: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
verses.verse_html: 2O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

tokens.text: in thee: let me not be ashamed

verses.text_plain: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
verses.verse_html: 3Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.

verses.text_plain: Shew me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.
verses.verse_html: 4Shew me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.

verses.text_plain: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
verses.verse_html: 5Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

verses.text_plain: Remember, O Lord, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
verses.verse_html:
6Remember, O Lord, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old. ▼
▼ tender…: Heb. bowels

verses.text_plain: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 7Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O Lord.

verses.text_plain: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
verses.verse_html: 8Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

verses.text_plain: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
verses.verse_html: 9The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

verses.text_plain: All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
verses.verse_html: 10All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

verses.text_plain: For thy name’s sake, O Lord, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
verses.verse_html: 11For thy name’s sake, O Lord, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.

verses.text_plain: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
verses.verse_html: 12What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

verses.text_plain: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
verses.verse_html:
13His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth. ▼
▼ dwell…: Heb. lodge in goodness

footnotes.body_html: ▼ dwell…: Heb. lodge in goodness

verses.text_plain: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
verses.verse_html:
14The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant. ▼
▼ and…: or, and his covenant to make them know it

footnotes.body_text: ▼ and…: or, and his covenant to make them know it
footnotes.body_html: ▼ and…: or, and his covenant to make them know it

verses.text_plain: Mine eyes are ever toward the Lord; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
verses.verse_html:
15Mine eyes are ever toward the Lord; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net. ▼
▼ pluck: Heb. bring forth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ pluck: Heb. bring forth

verses.text_plain: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
verses.verse_html: 16Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.

tokens.text: thee unto me, and have mercy

verses.text_plain: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
verses.verse_html: 17The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.

verses.text_plain: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
verses.verse_html: 18Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

verses.text_plain: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
verses.verse_html:
19Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred. ▼
▼ cruel…: Heb. hatred of violence

footnotes.body_html: ▼ cruel…: Heb. hatred of violence

verses.text_plain: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
verses.verse_html: 20O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.

tokens.text: me: let me not be ashamed

verses.text_plain: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
verses.verse_html: 21Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.

verses.text_plain: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
verses.verse_html: 22Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
